channel.title: RuneEvolution Remake
channel.description:
[center][b]RuneEvolution Remake
So if decide to make a remake from a delta server because im most of the time realy boring and decide to spend time just making this remake. Im not in a rush to finish this. But im looking for some partners to do this like some beta testers/web designer and a partner to code with me.[/b]
[b]Partner[/b] [code]Name: Position: Experience (proof): Why should i choose you?: Msn/Skype:[/code]
[b]Beta Tester[/b] [code]Name: How active will you be: Any experience in this?: Msn/Skype:[/code]
[b]Web designer[/b] [code]Name: Experience (proof): Why should i choose you?: Msn/Skype:[/code]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/a7ezb.png[/img]
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/ae8b2o.png[/img]
[b]Update Log:[/b] [code]20 December: Choose the base 21 December: Choose client base 21 December: Fixed the server to work with client 21 December: Fixed headicons 21 December: Added an cleaner Prayer system 21 December: Fixed packet 252 was bugged 24 December: Complete the pathfinding 25 December: Fixed Skullicons 25 December: Full woodcutting w/ nests and stumps[/code]
[/center]

item.title: RuneEvolution Remake
item.dc:creator: @lover854 lover854
item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:5, topic:426169”][quote author=lover854 link=topic=528859.msg3857815#msg3857815 date=1324479909]

Not an appealing development thread, we don’t know a thing about the development besides it being a remake and the based is Deltascape, please elaborate.

Prob wanna get the old rs feeling back what i miss and prob other ppl do to

There not realy anything to say its an clean base nothing realy on there and a clean client, just fixed some bugs atm
[/quote]
Show the aim of the project etc.[/quote]

Read full topic
